data.description:
Touchly is the next evolution of the VR video player. Turn videos into volumetric, immersive experiences.

It features:
- Virtual hands that react to the video environment.
- Six-degrees-of-freedom playback: Reduce eye strain and move freely with position tracking.
- Passthrough mode: Bring videos to your reality. Hologram-like.
- Play in most of the common layouts (180/360/Flat in Stereo/Mono) and formats (mp4, avi, mkv, mov, webm).

Other features include:
- Local streaming: With our new server app Touchly Cast.
- Hand tracking support.
- TactGlove support for haptics.
- Advanced settings: Rotation, position, color adjustment, depth adjustments, etc.
- Depth and Color matting for passthrough.
- Watch local or remote files with streaming.
- Customizable hands.

Important note: To watch videos in volumetric mode, they need to be converted first with Touchly Renderer (touchly.app/renderer). Only a couple of demo videos are included in the app.

changelog.change_log:
- Crash prevention when selecting Cast.
- Fixed wrong version being displayed.
- "Edge sensitivity" adjustments and "Width" inverted for color matting.
- Added a cache deleting button.

- Local streaming support with our new server Touchly Cast
- Full hand tracking support
- Haptic glove support for Bhaptics TactGlove
- Fix menu hiding when pressing anywhere outside menu

-New format: Use any 2D video instead of only VR180.
-Resize and rotate with two hand gestures.
-Bug fixes.

Misc:
- Fixed UI elements not being rendered always on top of the view.

Passthrough mode improvements:
- Added a “color matting option”. Now you can key out backgrounds close to a certain color. You can choose the color by pointing to it on the preview screen.
- Added a “focus” slider, creates a radial gradient from the center of the image.

New settings:
- Added settings to resume playback, and set a custom skipping time.
- Added a “Watch only” mode, where interaction/physics is disabled.
- New hand model added, you can now choose between “Human” and “Robot” hands.
- Hand color customization, you can select preset skin color values or choose with a HSV selector.
